alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:30PM CDT until March 26 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 329 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seale, or 13 miles southwest of Phenix City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Ladonia, Russell County Sports Complex, Seale, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Ladonia Sports Complex, Fort Mitchell Activity Center, Phenix Drag Strip and Parkmanville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
